control_attributes.Control: IA-2 (8) NETWORK ACCESS TO PRIVILEGED ACCOUNTS - REPLAY RESISTANT
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access to privileged accounts.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization prohibits the use of information system account identifiers that are the same as public identifiers for individual electronic mail accounts.

Control Statement: The information system implements replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access to privileged accounts.
Control Name: IA-2 (8) NETWORK ACCESS TO PRIVILEGED ACCOUNTS - REPLAY RESISTANT
